title: 11. Suor Maria Celeste: a 'Poor Clare' of Florence
itunes:title: 11. Suor Maria Celeste: a 'Poor Clare' of Florence
description: Season 2, Episode 1: Jay tells Alex about Suor Maria Celeste, a nun of the impoverished Order of St. Clare of Assisi who was industrious, surprisingly well educated, and whose records survived because she happened to have a famous father.
